title.rendered: “IDF Airstrikes Target Hezbollah Structures Amid Rising Tensions on Northern Border”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF destroyed two military structures belonging to the terror organization Hezbollah, where terrorists were present.

Earlier today, several terrorists were identified entering two buildings of the Hezbollah terror organization in the Mis al-Jabal area.

Fighter jets from the Air Force destroyed both structures where the terrorists were located.

Additionally, the IDF carried out artillery strikes to remove a threat in the Al-Adaysa area.

Following alerts activated in the north of the country at 16:15, one projectile was identified crossing from Lebanon and landing in an open area.

Following alerts activated at 16:45 in the north of the country, air defense fighters intercepted one launch that crossed from Lebanese territory, while another launch from Lebanon landed in an open area.

Attached is footage from the attack: https://bit.ly/3Y03oiX
